int tmp[1000002];
int main()
{
int t,i,k,l,l1;
string s1;
vector<int>v;
s(t);
while(t--)
{
v.clear();
int ans=0;
cin>>s1;
s(k);s(l);
l1=l;
if(k>l)
printf("%d\n",l);
else
{
  int count=0;
    for(i=0;i<s1.length();++i)
    tmp[i]=(int)s1[i]-97;
    int ct=1;
    for(i=1;i<s1.length();++i)
    {
      if(tmp[i]==tmp[i-1])
      ct++;
      else
      {
      count++;
        v.pb(ct);
        ct=1;
      }
    }
    v.pb(ct);
    count++;
    sort(v.begin(),v.end());
     //cout<<count<<" "<<v[0];
    for(i=count-1;i>=0;--i)
    {
      l1-=min(v[i],k);
      v[i]=max(0,v[i]-k);
      if(l1<=0)
      break;
    }
    if(l1<=0)
    {
    printf("%d\n",l);
    continue;
    }
    else
    {

     ans=l;
     while(1)
     {
         sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        l1-=min(k,v[count-1]);
        v[count-1]=max(0,v[count-1]-k);

        if(l1<=0)break;
     }
     printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
